name: Earth Advisor
description:
This is an experience for the Eden Holland park in the Netherlands.

There are two applications you need to run.
The Panorama needs to be run on a Windows computer with a webcam.
The Mobile version can only run on an Android phone with GPS and internet.
Please note that this experience works best at the HKU location of G&I.

Walk the route on the screen. At the end ask for your QR code in the mobile app. Once arrived at the Panorama, scan your QR code at the Panorama and enjoy the view.
